ace-reflector-insights.description: ACE Reflector agent insight generation system for pattern analysis and meta-learning

playbook-structure.description: ACE playbook directory structure with insights.md files for pattern documentation

yaml-frontmatter-metadata.description: YAML frontmatter for structured metadata in markdown documentation

meta-learning-architecture.description: Self-improving system that learns from pattern usage to enhance definitions and detect edge cases

evolutionary-documentation.description: Documentation that evolves through automated agent analysis rather than static manual updates

structured-content-generation.description: Machine-generated content with consistent structure, metadata, and human-readable format

evidence-based-learning.description: Pattern analysis based on actual codebase usage rather than theoretical definitions

machine-generated-with-human-readability.description: Auto-generated files maintain human-readable markdown format with clear sections and explanations

metadata-driven-documentation.description: Use structured metadata (YAML frontmatter) to enable programmatic processing while preserving readability

confidence-based-learning.description: Track observation counts and confidence metrics to distinguish proven patterns from experimental ones

separation-of-concerns.description: Separate pattern definition (spec.md) from usage insights (insights.md) from implementation plans (plan.md)

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and YAML frontmatter content
metadata.analysis_notes: Analyzed auto-generated Reflector insight file with YAML frontmatter metadata. Discovered ACE's meta-learning architecture through evidence of insight tracking, pattern effectiveness analysis, and evolutionary documentation system.
